question: How can I tutor a 10-year-old in basic astronomy and generate an image of the solar system?

Can you include a fun fact about each planet?
Plan: 1) Search for fun facts about each planet in the solar system. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for fun facts about each planet in the solar system.

Fun facts: Mercury is the smallest planet. Venus is the hottest. Earth is the only planet with life. Mars has the tallest volcano. Jupiter is the largest. Saturn has the most beautiful rings. Uranus rotates on its side. Neptune has the strongest winds.
